author: rbb
msg: Remove all of the calls to functions like "ap_popenf".  These functions were
moved down to APR, but they are being removed.  They are not portable, and
were only moved down for backwards compatability.  With this change, they can
be safely removed, which is the next commit on it's way.
Submitted by:  Ryan Bloom and Paul Reder

author: stoddard
msg: It's hot and humid in Raleigh today. Summer is still here.

author: stoddard
msg: Missed a continue on the last patch. Simplified the code a bit.

author: stoddard
msg: errno on WIN32 is not thread safe. Use h_errno (which resolves to WSAGetLastError) instead.
